main.com.cryptogram.solver

Class Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.com.cryptogram.solver.Solver

  • public final class Solver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is in charge of the algorithm for solving the cryptogram.
    Author:
    Corbin Young

    • Method Detail

      • createKey

        private void createKey()
        General algorithm to solve the cryptogram 1. Pick a match with the first word starting at index 0 2. Push the indexes of the word and its decryption onto the stack 3. Increment the index for the decrypted words and pick another match to add to the stack 4. While no match is found that could be added to the key and we haven't removed everything from the stack 4a. Pop a match off the stack and reset the key 4b. Go back to the previous encrypted word and find a different match 5. If the stack is now empty and we still haven't found a valid match, the cryptogram is unsolvable 6. Otherwise, push our new match on the stack and repeat 2-6

      • displayKey

        public final java.lang.String displayKey()
        This method displays the Key
        Returns:
        final working version of the key

      • getEncryptedMsg

        public final java.lang.String getEncryptedMsg()
        This method gets the original encrypted message from DataStorage
        Returns:
        original encrypted message

      • getInstance

        public static Solver getInstance()
        Returns the instance of the Solver
        Returns:
        instance

      • pickMatch

        private int pickMatch(java.lang.String word,
                      int index)
        This method checks pairs of an encrypted word with its set of decryptions against the Key
        Parameters:
        word - encrypted word
        index - starting index in the list of decrypted matches
        Returns:
        the index of a pair that was successfully inserted into the key

      • reset

        private void reset()
        This method resets the Key, DataStorage, and the Stack.

      • solve

        public final java.lang.String solve(java.lang.String file)
        This method reads all of the data into storage and the dictionary and then solves the cryptogram and returns the final decrypted message.
        Parameters:
        file - contains the name of the file that holds the encrypted message
        Returns:
        final decrypted message

      • translate

        private java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String encryptedMsg)
        This method translates the original encrypted message into the final decrypted form based on the Key.
        Parameters:
        encryptedMsg - original encrypted message
        Returns:
        the final decrypted message
